snippet.title: Treason | GamePlay PC
snippet.description:
In Treason, a group of mobsters finds a dead body. The Don was murdered!
The innocents must look for clues to identify the traitors and hold the murderer(s) accountable for their actions.

When the game begins, a small group of players are chosen at random to be Traitors, and they have to murder every Innocent player. The bulk of the participants are innocent, but they are unaware of who is a traitor and who is not. The traitors can triumph by utilizing unique skills that they possess.

- Clue Processing Unit system:
Throughout the round, the body of the Don spawns. When a player finds this body, clues will be spawned over the map and players will have to collect them. If they bring enough clues to the C.P.U., one of the traitors will be revealed.
Watch out for traitors stealing clues and possible suspicious behavior that comes with it.

- The innocents win by finding out who the traitors are and take them out.
- The traitors win by murdering all the innocents.
- The detective must investigate corpses found by players to nose out who the traitors are.

Innocent: Find clues to snuff out traitors.
Abilities:
Medkit - Heal yourself

Traitor: Eliminate all innocents.
Abilities:
Medkit - Heal yourself
Revive - Revive a dead body that will turn into a Zombie Traitor
Radar - Reveal player locations for a short amount of time
Bomb - Plant a bomb on designated bomb sites

Detective: Scan bodies to publicly confirm deaths.
Abilities:
Medkit - Heal yourself
DNA Scan - Scan a body to reveal the killer

Zombie Traitor: Help traitors to get rid of the innocents.
Abilities:
Radar - Reveal player locations for a short amount of time
Bomb - Plant a bomb on designated bomb sites
